parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: String filter condition, like "name='my-model-name'". Must be a single boolean condition, with string values wrapped in single quotes.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of models desired. Max threshold is 10K.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: List of columns to be ordered by including model name, version, stage with an optional "DESC" or "ASC" annotation, where "ASC" is the default. Tiebreaks are done by latest stage transition timestamp, followed by name ASC, followed by version DESC.

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Pagination token to go to next page based on previous search query.

get.description: Searches for specific model versions based on the supplied
